I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Hsl: s <> l

Hal: a <> l
Hhl: h <> l
lt: list (list bool * list bool)
p: nat
i: nat
lFD: nat
v: Vector.t (list bool) n
ln: list nat
lc: list bool

Goal:
v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> v#>a = nil -> v#>s = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> (Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k))) \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ lc = nil /\ (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in hh <> ll) -> (i, main_loop) // (i, v) ->> (i, v[(list_bool_next (v#>s))/s])

Premises:
Forall : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Exists : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
Notation pos := Fin.t
Notation Zero := false
list_nat_bool = fix list_nat_bool (ln : list nat) : list bool := match ln with | nil => nil | x :: ll => list_repeat Zero x ++ One :: list_nat_bool ll end : list nat -> list bool Arguments list_nat_bool _%list_scope
main_loop = copy_stack s a h i ++ full_decoder a h l (lFD + 16 + i) (lFD + 26 + i) (16 + i) lt ++ compare_stacks h l (lFD + 16 + i) p (lFD + 26 + i) ++ increment_erase (lFD + 26 + i) i : list (bsm_instr n)
tile_concat = fix tile_concat (ln : list nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) {struct ln} : list bool * list bool := match ln with | nil => (nil, nil) | x :: ln0 => let (th, tl) := nth x lt (nil, nil) in let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln0 lt in (hh ++ th, ll ++ tl) end : list nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list bool * list bool Arguments tile_concat (_ _)%list_scope
list_bool_next = let list_bool_next_def := fun l : list bool => let s := list_bool_choose_sym l in match s with | inl (existT _ k (exist _ tl H)) => eq_rec_r (fun l0 : list bool => {m : list bool | list_bool_succ l0 m}) (exist (fun m : list bool => list_bool_succ (list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: tl) m) (list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: tl) (in_lbs_0 k tl)) H | inr (exist _ k H) => eq_rec_r (fun l0 : list bool => {m : list bool | list_bool_succ l0 m}) (exist (fun m : list bool => list_bool_succ (list_repeat One k) m) (list_repeat Zero (S k)) (in_lbs_1 k)) H end
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
list_repeat : forall X : Type, X -> nat -> list X
main_loop_ok_spec : forall (v : vec (list bool) n) (ln : list nat), v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> v#>a = nil -> v#>s = list_nat_bool ln -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in hh = ll) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, main_loop) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall x : pos n, x <> a -> x <> h -> x <> l -> v#>x = w#>x)
tiles_solvable = fun lt : list (list bool * list bool) => exists ln : list nat, ln <> nil /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in hh = ll) : list (list bool * list bool) -> Prop Arguments tiles_solvable _%list_scope
full_decoder_ko_spec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_decoder_ok_spec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln -> v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (p, v[nil/c][hh/h][ll/l])

full_dec_spec_rec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt in (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (i, v[lc/c][(hh ++ v#>h)/h][(ll ++ v#>l)/l])

list_bool_valid = fun (k : nat) (lb : list bool) (ln : list nat) => lb = list_nat_bool ln /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < k) ln : nat -> list bool -> list nat -> Prop Arguments list_bool_valid _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat s : pos n a : pos n h : pos n l : pos n Hsa : s <> a Hsh : s <> h Hsl : s <> l Hah : a <> h Hal : a <> l Hhl : h <> l lt : list (list bool * list bool) i : nat p : nat lFD := length_full_decoder lt : nat v : vec (list bool) n ln : list nat lc : list bool |- nat]

decoder_spec_ok : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (q s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (th tl : list bool) (lr : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (length ll) ++ One :: lc -> st = (s, v[lc/c][(th ++ v#>h)/h][(tl ++ v#>l)/l]) -> (i, decoder c h l q s i (ll ++ (th, tl) :: lr)) // (i, v) -> > st

full_dec_spec_rec2 : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> forall (p q i k : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (S k) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
